result.title: Training Camp #1
result.content:
Hi,

there will be a group training camp held this saturday. The training camp will be 2 moth long. It is divided into 2 parts:-

1) algorithmic concepts like dp,greedy etc.

2) data structures like segment, fenwick tree.

each of the part will be 1 month long and each day I will add 5 problems from a specific category(e.g dp). the difficulty will increase each day. Also it is allowed to discuss the problems within the group.
